original: 歷仕曹魏、西晉。記載不多，大多作為偏將隨軍出征，曾參與魏滅蜀之戰、西晉時討鮮卑王禿髮樹機能之役。
text: Li Shi Cao Wei, Western Jin Dynasty. There are not many records. Most of them went out with the army as partial generals, and participated in the battle of Wei to destroy Shu and the battle of fighting for the bald tree function of King Xianbei in the Western Jin Dynasty.
